name: WATER DESERT v.1.0
description:
this is just a mini game..... the game is all about a girl who wants to nourish her front tree house. you will play as that girl . But in that place the water is very hard to find and there is many trouble ahead . ......

ALERT :    Make sure your anti virus does not interfere with this game

Please give me criticism and suggestion because i need it
